meanings.meaning: [U] 거듦(help), 조력, 원조, 보조; [고어] 출석(한 사람들)
meanings.originalMeaning: [U] 거듦(help), 조력, 원조, 보조; [고어] 출석(한 사람들)

examples.translatedText: 그는 나의 사업에 뒷받침이 되어 주었다
examples.text: He backed me up in my business. or He gave his assistances to me in my business.

examples.translatedText: 내가 사업에 성공한 것은 당신의 덕이오
examples.text: I owe my success in business to you. or Thanks to your assistance, I succeeded in business.
To be helped by you, sir, is too great an honor for me. or I am overwhelmed by your assistance, sir.
I do not need assistance from outside.

examples.translatedText: 나는 그의 도움을 적지 않게 입었다
examples.text: I owed much[not a little] to his assistance.
